settings.body: Welcome to Ezydog Australia's Discounts and Promotions page! Here, you'll find all the information you need about our fantastic deals and how to access them.

settings.content:
TERMS & CONDITIONS
1. Offer: Free standard shipping on all orders, with no minimum spend required.
2. Promotion Period: Valid from 9:00AM AEST 17/10/25 until 11:59 PM AEST 19/10/25.
3. Eligibility: Offer available to customers within Australia only.
4. Shipping Method: Applies to standard shipping only. Express or expedited shipping options are excluded.
5. No Code Required: Discount is automatically applied at checkout.
6. Exclusions: Not valid for wholesale, bulk, or trade orders.
7. Right to Modify: EzyDog reserves the right to change or cancel this promotion at any time without notice.

TERMS & CONDITIONS
1. Offer: Receive one (1) set of Personalised Labels free with purchases $75+: Valid from 9:00AM AEST 10/10/25 until 11:59 PM AEST 12/10/25.
3. Eligibility: Offer available to customers within Australia only.
4. Eligibility: Purchase value must reach the minimum purchase threshold of $75.
5. How to Redeem: Free Personalised Labels must be added to cart by the customer. Discount will automatically apply at checkout when mimimum purchase threshold is met – no code required.
6. Exclusions: Not valid on wholesale, trade, or bulk orders.
7. Limit: One free set of Personalised Labels per qualifying order.
8. Returns: Personalised Labels are not eligible for refunds or returns, unless there has been a printing error on behalf of EzyDog.
9. Right to Modify: EzyDog reserves the right to amend or cancel this promotion at any time without prior notice.

TERMS & CONDITIONS
1. Offer: Receive one (1) Click Dog Seat Belt free with any order of $60 or more (excluding shipping).
2. Promotion Period: Valid from 1:00PM AEST 26/09/25 until 11:59 PM AEST 28/09/25.
3. Eligibility: Offer available to customers within Australia only.
4. Minimum Spend: $60 minimum spend must be met in a single transaction, excluding shipping fees.
5. How to Redeem: Free gift must be added to cart by customer. Discount will automatically apply to eligible carts at checkout - no code required.
6. Exclusions: Not valid on wholesale, trade, or bulk orders.
7. Limit: One free Click Dog Seat Belt per qualifying order.
8. Returns: If returning items for a refund and the remaining order value falls below $60, the cost of the seat belt may be deducted from the refund.
9. Right to Modify: EzyDog reserves the right to amend or cancel this promotion at any time without prior notice.

TERMS & CONDITIONS
1. Offer: Free standard shipping on all orders, with no minimum spend required.
2. Promotion Period: Valid from 9:00AM AEST 19/09/25 until 11:59 PM AEST 21/09/25.
3. Eligibility: Offer available to customers within Australia only.
4. Shipping Method: Applies to standard shipping only. Express or expedited shipping options are excluded.
5. No Code Required: Discount is automatically applied at checkout.
6. Exclusions: Not valid for wholesale, bulk, or trade orders.
7. Right to Modify: EzyDog reserves the right to change or cancel this promotion at any time without notice.

TERMS & CONDITIONS
1. One-Time Reward: The $20 discount code offer applies only to the first pet profile you complete to 100%. Additional pet profiles are not eligible for further rewards.
2. Minimum Spend: A minimum spend of $100 AUD (excluding shipping) is required in order to redeem the $20 discount code.
3. Unique Discount Code: You will receive a unique discount code via email once your first pet’s profile reaches 100% completion. This code must be entered at checkout to apply the discount.
4. Expiry: The discount code is valid for 3 months from the date of issue. After this time, it will expire and cannot be reissued or extended.
5. Non-Transferable & Single Use: The discount code is single-use only and cannot be transferred, exchanged for cash, or used in conjunction with other promotional codes.
6. EzyDog Australia Only: Offer valid for use on the EzyDog Australia website only (ezydog.com.au) and for Australian customers.

settings.card_description:
EOFY DEAL - WEEK 3!

Week 3 Sale applies to products in the EOFY UP TO 20% OFF collection.

Spend & Save applies as follows:
Spend $100-$149 = $15 off order.
Spend $150-$199 = $25 off order.
Spend $200+ = $40 off order.

To redeem Free GO2 Light - customers must spend a minimum of $75, and add their choice of GO2 Light to cart, for the discount to automatically apply. Free Gift is limited to one per customer.

Offers begin 11:59pm Sunday, 22nd of June 2025, and end 11:59pm on Sunday, 29th June 2025. Offers available while stocks last, and cannot be combined with other offers. No rainchecks or substitutions.

EzyDog reserves the right to modify or cancel the promotion at any time.

Click here to shop EOFY WEEK 3 SALE.

EOFY DEAL - WEEK 2!

Week 2 Sale applies to products in the EOFY UP TO 30% OFF collection.

To redeem Free Uno Bowl - customers must spend a minimum of $75, and add their choice of Uno Bowl to cart, for the discount to automatically apply. Free Gift is limited to one per customer.

Offers begins 11:59pm Sunday, 15th of June 2025, and end 11:59pm on Sunday, 22nd June 2025. Offers available while stocks last, and cannot be combined with other offers. No rainchecks or substitutions.

EzyDog reserves the right to modify or cancel the promotion at any time.

Click here to shop EOFY WEEK 2 SALE.

EOFY DEAL - WEEK 1!

Week 1 Sale applies to products in the EOFY UP TO 60% OFF collection.

To redeem Free ODROUT Wipes - customers must add at least 1 product to their cart, along with 1 pack of ODROUT Wipes, for the discount to automatically apply. Free Gift is limited to one per customer.

Offers begin 11:59pm Sunday, 8th of June 2025, and end 11:59pm on Sunday, 15th June 2025. Offers available while stocks last, and cannot be combined with other offers. No rainchecks or substitutions.

EzyDog reserves the right to modify or cancel the promotion at any time.

Click here to shop EOFY WEEK 1 SALE.

settings.card_title: TERMS & CONDITIONS  MY EZYDOG - PET PROFILES
settings.card_description:
TERMS & CONDITIONS
MY EZYDOG - PET PROFILES

1. One-Time Reward:
The $20 credit offer applies only to the first pet profile you complete. Additional pet profiles are not eligible for further rewards.

2. Minimum Spend:
A minimum spend of $100 AUD (excluding shipping) is required in order to redeem the $20 credit.

3. Unique Discount Code:
You will receive a unique discount code via email once your first pet’s profile reaches 100% completion. This code must be entered at checkout to apply the discount.

4. Expiry:
The discount code is valid for 3 months from the date of issue. After this time, it will expire and cannot be reissued or extended.

5. Non-Transferable & Single Use:
The discount code is single-use only and cannot be transferred, exchanged for cash, or used in conjunction with other promotional codes.

6. EzyDog Australia Only:
Offer valid for use on the EzyDog Australia website only (ezydog.com.au) and for Australian customers.

FREE SHIPPING ON ESSENTIALS COLLECTION

Offer applies applies to Standard Shipping on products from the new Essentials Collection only.

To redeem, customers must add at least one product from the Essentials Collection to cart, and shipping discount will automatically apply.

Offer begins 9am Friday, 25th of July 2025, and ends 11:59pm on Sunday, 27th July 2025. Offer available while stocks last, and cannot be combined with other offers. No rainchecks or substitutions.

EzyDog reserves the right to modify or cancel the promotion at any time.

Click here to shop Essentials Collection.

Offer applies to Bedding Bundles and Personalised Labels.

Discount will be automatically applied when any Bedding Bundle from the Bedding Bundles Collection and a set of Personalised Labels are added to Cart.

Offer begins 11:59pm Tuesday, 2nd of June 2025, and ends 11:59pm on Sunday, 8th June 2025. Valid while stocks last, and cannot be combined with other offers. No rainchecks or substitutions.

EzyDog reserves the right to modify or cancel the promotion at any time.

Click here to shop Bedding Bundles.

Offer applies to All Bundles

Offer begins 11:59pm Tuesday, 26th of May 2025, and ends 11:59pm on Sunday, 1st June 2025. Valid while stocks last, and cannot be combined with other offers. No rainchecks or substitutions.

EzyDog reserves the right to modify or cancel the promotion at any time.

Click here to shop Bundles.

Offer applies to Thermax Vest, and Beds in the Orthopedic Dog Beds Collection.

Discount will be automatically applied when any bed from the Orthopedic Dog Beds Collection and a Thermax Vest are added to Cart.

Offer begins 11:59pm Tuesday, 19th of May 2025, and ends 11:59pm on Sunday, 25th May 2025. Valid while stocks last, and cannot be combined with other offers. No rainchecks or substitutions.

EzyDog reserves the right to modify or cancel the promotion at any time.

Click here to shop Orthopedic Dog Beds.

Offer applies to Collars in the Designer Dog Collars Collection, and Harnesses in the Designer Dog Harnesses Collection.

Discount will be automatically applied when both Designer Dog Collar and Designer Dog Harness are added to Cart.

Offer begins 11:59pm Tuesday, 13th of May 2025, and ends 11:59pm on Sunday, 18th May 2025. Valid while stocks last, and cannot be combined with other offers. No rainchecks or substitutions.

EzyDog reserves the right to modify or cancel the promotion at any time.

Click here to shop Designer Collection.
